amendatorysection.chaptername: State Uni., State Colleges, and Post. Education
amendatorysection.para: The following are exempt from the Postsecondary Institution Act:

(1) Any institution or organization which offers education or instruction and which is licensed and regulated solely by an agency of the federal government with respect to curriculum and qualifications of instructional staff; or
(2) Any private postsecondary career school as defined in the Private Postsecondary Career School Act.

crossreference.para: Private Postsecondary Career School Act, see section 85-1601.
